fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Protect a player they gain a 0.09% chance to not die by any means tonight, very talented ants. (5400 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your ability may be used any number of times per night to stack the percentage.
- If you protect multiple players at once, the number of uses you can put on each is capped:
- 2 — 928
- 3 — 754
- 4 — 612
- 5 — 465
- 6+ — 261
- 5.4 in 5400 chance to instantly win at the start of each phase by making the colony prosper.
